itunes:title: Jocko Podcast 17: Band of Brothers, Losing the Fight Going Down Swinging, Jocko/Echo Backstory
title: Jocko Podcast 17: Band of Brothers, Losing the Fight Going Down Swinging, Jocko/Echo Backstory
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
itunes:subtitle: 0:00:00 - Opening - 0:08:33 - Book Review, "Beyond Band of Brothers", by Dick Winters - 1:17:24 - Rough Transitions - 1:25:30 - Jocko Podcast and Onnit Stuff - 1:28:24 - Is Extreme Ownership the same as Apologizing? -
itunes:summary:
0:00:00 - Opening 0:08:33 - Book Review, "Beyond Band of Brothers", by Dick Winters 1:17:24 - Rough Transitions 1:25:30 - Jocko Podcast and Onnit Stuff 1:28:24 - Is Extreme Ownership the same as Apologizing? 1:33:04 - Can you be a "straight shooter" and not be a Jerk? 1:42:21 - Jocko's #1 Philosophical lesson from Jiu Jitsu. 1:54:48 - Over-commitment to a wrong opinion. 1:58:55 - What brought Jocko and Echo together.  The back story. 2:22:41 - Losing a fight, but going down swinging.

Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/jocko-podcast/exclusive-content
